title: What is this matchmaking??
body:
http://imgur.com/VpTX8xC

Sure I won but really now. This is a game I was clearly supposed to lose. I won because of OP Mordekaiser. 

That Lee Sin may have been gold 3 but he played like a diamond.....it was scary...

It was a fun game and very intense. I want more games like these but at least make it a bit more even RITO...I would rather see unranked than gold vs master
